name: OV_1_Overarching_Criteria
title: OV.1 Overarching Criteria (Function)
description: Overarching criteria are those that apply to all EHR Systems.
purpose: The Overarching Section contains Conformance Criteria that apply to all EHR Systems and consequently must be included in all EHR-S FM compliant profiles. These criteria are grouped under a single Function.

statement.label: OV.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[CP.9.1]] (Produce a Summary Record of Care).

statement.label: OV.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[CPS.9.3]] (Health Record Output).

statement.label: OV.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[CPS.9.4]] (Standard Report Generation).

statement.label: OV.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[RI.1.1]] (Record Lifecycle) and all child functions.

statement.label: OV.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[RI.1.2]] (Record Lifespan) and all child functions.

statement.label: OV.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[RI.2]] (Record Synchronization).

statement.label: OV.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[RI.3]] (Record Archive and Restore).

statement.label: OV.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.1.1]] (Entity Authentication).

statement.label: OV.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.1.2]] (Entity Authorization) .

statement.label: OV.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.1.3]] (Entity Access Control).

statement.label: OV.1#11
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.1.4]] (Patient Access Management).

statement.label: OV.1#12
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.1.5]] (Non-Repudiation).

statement.label: OV.1#13
statement.requirement: IF the system transmits data to or receives data from a system outside of a secure network, THEN the system SHALL conform to function [[TI.1.6]] (Secure Data Exchange), to ensure that the data are protected.

statement.label: OV.1#14
statement.requirement: IF the system transmits data to or receives data from a system outside of a secure network, THEN the system SHALL conform to function [[TI.1.7]] (Secure Data Routing), to ensure that the exchange occurs only among authorized senders and receivers.

statement.label: OV.1#15
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.1.8]] (Patient Privacy and Confidentiality).

statement.label: OV.1#16
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.2]] (Audit) and all child functions.

statement.label: OV.1#17
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD conform to function [[TI.3]] (Registry and Directory Services).

statement.label: OV.1#18
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.4]] (Standard Terminology and Terminology Services).

statement.label: OV.1#19
statement.requirement: IF the system manages data for which standard terminologies have been established, THEN the system SHALL conform to function [[TI.4.1]] (Standard Terminologies and Terminology Models) to support semantic interoperability.

statement.label: OV.1#20
statement.requirement: IF the system manages data for which standard terminologies have been established, THEN the system SHALL conform to function [[TI.4.2]] (Maintenance and Versioning of Standard Terminologies) to preserve the semantics of coded data over time.

statement.label: OV.1#21
statement.requirement: IF terminology mapping is implemented within the system, THEN the system SHALL conform to function [[TI.4.3]] (Terminology Mapping).

statement.label: OV.1#22
statement.requirement: IF the system receives or transmits data for which jurisdictionally established interchange standards exist, THEN the system SHALL conform to function [[TI.5.1]] (Application and Structured-Document Interchange Standards) and all child functions to support interoperability.

statement.label: OV.1#23
statement.requirement: IF the system receives and transmits data for which generally accepted interchange standards have been established, THEN the system SHALL conform to function [[TI.5.2]] (Interchange Standards Versioning and Maintenance), to accommodate the inevitable evolution of interchange standards.

statement.label: OV.1#24
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD conform to function [[TI.5.3]] (Standards-based Application Integration).

statement.label: OV.1#25
statement.requirement: IF the system receives and transmits data with other systems outside itself, THEN the system SHALL conform to function [[TI.5.4]] (Interchange Agreements), to define how the sender and receiver will exchange data.

statement.label: OV.1#26
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD conform to function [[TI.6]] (Business Rules Management).

statement.label: OV.1#27
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD conform to function [[TI.7]] (Workflow Management).

statement.label: OV.1#28
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.8]] (Database Backup and Recovery).

statement.label: OV.1#29
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[CPS.10]] (Manage User Help).

statement.label: OV.1#30
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[TI.9]] (System Management Operations and Performance).
